lead_paragraph: Ashton B. Carter continued to use a personal account for government work at least four months after the White House questioned the Pentagon about why he was using it, the released emails show.

headline.main: Pentagon Chief Used Personal Email After White House Query

snippet: Ashton B. Carter continued to use a personal account for government work at least four months after the White House questioned the Pentagon about why he was using it, the released emails show.
abstract: Defense Dept releases emails revealing Defense Sec Ashton B Carter used personal email account for official work for at least four months in 2015, even after White House questioned his use of account for government work.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
